content.detailedDescription: I was outside lighting up a smoke and notice this flash north of venus and almost just as bright and it was just left of the constallation(?-square shape) in the lower north sky. it happened at 6:40. it was clear and brisk out. a small plane was flying just below this and heading towards my house. then 2 minutes later while combing the skies,opposite in the sky i noticed a single light traveling slightly faster than a jumbo jet coming from the mountain range of la honda/pagemill rd. going towards san francisco. after it was just about out of my sight the neighbors dog barked a few times but nothing outrageous/mellow like. then less than 3 minutes after that, i looked in the opposite direction on the other side of the sky close to the initial flash location, flying at half the altitude that i saw the first moving light (which was probably at around 10,000 to 20,000 feet or higher)this one was estamated at around 6,000 may be a little less. i did grab my binoculars and caught a glimps of the first one flying away from me. but i got good look at the second one and to say both had no sound,not even a delay sound as high flying planes have. the second light was pointed in a sort of downward direction and traveling may be 2/3 the speed of the first one. just after loseing sight of the second ufo/light a large jumbo jet coming from the north and low had all of it's light's on and looked like a christmas tree. it was banking pretty hard and headed for one of the three major airports in the bayarea. this was at 6:49. i heard it's landing gears open and the engines roaring and also the neighbors dog started barking but only briefly. so what was that other stuff? this stuff has happened more than a couple of times. that flash keeps happening the same location...May be it's a porthole or something!
content.summary: There was a flash north of venus,then saw a single light opposite in the sky traveling faster than normal, then another closer and going in the opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep in bed, it was approximately 2:45 - 3:00a.M.  i woke up (wide awake) for some odd reason and couldn't get back to sleep.  so i decided to go outside on the patio (back yard) to have a smoke. 

it was a warm night for november and found myself making mental notes about my surroundings..... peaceful... quiet.... no planes flying overhead.... moon very bright.... then i heard a low aircraft-humming sound but could not see anything because of the bright moonlight.  as i continued to look up a large object became sillouetted against the moonlight.  

my first thought is, of course, it's an airplane, but it was flying at such a slow speed i was able to examine it quite thoroughly. as i began looking at it i steadily got a heavy, threatened feeling run through me.  it was like nothing i'd seen before: it didn't have any wings (like an airplane does), it was one solid smooth-edged triangle. 

i then walked further into the backyard so as to get a different perspective of the situation.  what struck me dumbfounded was it didn't have any lights on it.... anywhere.... just a smooth dark gray or black triangle. that's when the left brain kicked in and i foolishly concluded that it was something from the millington navy base... a military test or something.  

to this day i could kick myself in the butt for not staying up to see where it went; unfortunately, i went back to bed.

if asked today, i would say it was not an airplane.  the basis for this conclusion is the fact that my daughter had a sighting of her own two streets over and a few days before mine.  coincidence?
content.summary: See detailed description.

content.detailedDescription: Just a few moments ago i went outside to retrieve the mail. in the southwestern sky noticed what initially thought was venus. but, at the time of day of 4:55pm was too early to be up and seen with the sun just approaching the horizon. i stared and noticed it was moving when compared to the power lines. the motion was downward when compared to the power lines. it was brilliant and bright like a star if you were to see a star in mid-day then simply it vanished after about a minute. i live nearby to lax and being a plane euthusiast i am quite sure that it wasn't a plane. reflections of planes don't resemble a star-like resemblence.
content.summary: Star/planet-like but was moving and then disappeared.
I did not see anything!

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back-yard waiting for my dogs to do their business. i noticed above me in the sky were 2 single engine airplanes. i started to watch them because they were flying pretty close to each other. as they started to pass out of view, i noticed an object thousands of feet higher than the airplanes. it was completely motionless. i watched the object for 4-5 minutes. i have never seen a star during the day but i hear its possible sometimes. so i thought if it were a star then it would still be there if i looked away. i looked away for a second and then back again. the object was gone. i scanned the rest of the sky over and over, and couldnt see the object anywhere. it appeared to be just a circular white object. i couldnt see much more than that. it also appeared to by much higher than any airplane i've seen fly.
content.summary: Object in the sky - appeared to be watching airplanes.

content.detailedDescription: I have a camera set up to take pictures of deer walking by the camera.The camera took three pictures that i am not sure what they could be i will send the pics and a blank daylight picture of the spot the pics were taken
content.summary: Pictures taken with a remote deer camera.

content.detailedDescription: On a cold october or late november night in montgomery, alabama myself and my peewee football teammates had just won the city championship game. approximately 6 to 8 of us spent the night in a neighborhood called carol villa. we sneaked out of the house that night at about 11:00pm to meet up with some girls on a dead end street just a few blocks away. we were all standing and/or sitting on our bikes underneath a street light when i noticed a disc shaped metallic craft approaching from the north at an altitude of about 150 to 300 feet and a speed of about 10 to 20 mph. the craft was completely silent in its approach and had an array of lights that circled its outermost edge. i would guess the disc was approximately 50 to 75 feet in diameter and maybe 15 to 25 feet from bottom to top. there were 2 rows of lights around its edge, the lower row was a lime shade of green and flashed in a clockwise movement around the craft and the upper row was orange in color and flashed simultaneousely in a counterclockwise movement. the 2 rows of lights were no more than a few inches apart from the other. it had a domed sort of top on it that was circled by windows from which an amber colored light eminated. from our angle on the ground i could actually see moving shadows being cast onto the ceiling of the craft from inside. the shadows moved and flickered against the ceiling in a curious and eratic manner. the craft moved slowly as it approached a point approximately 200 to 400 feet to our west over an open field. we all watched the craft and speculated aloud what it might be. i knew immediately that it was not any conventional craft that i had ever seen or heard of. this thing made no sound at all as it stopped in mid-air. the field was known as marshalls field and was inaccessable to us because of a dense briar patch that grew between the street and the field. we all were astonished by this event and as we watched the craft hanging silently in mid-air, it began to descend into the field dissapearing behind the bushes and briars that blocked our view. we began trying to penetrate the briars to see if the craft had actually landed but the briars were too dense. we discussed whether to go down a few blocks because we knew of a bike trail that entered the field from another dead end street 2 blocks down. one of our linemen (ken) only lived a few houses from where we were so he decided to sneak back into his bedroom window and get his camera. he jumped on his bike and dissapeared around the corner. we all continued to discuss running down to the bike trail to see if we could get a better look at the craft when suddenly it arose from the field and hovered again exactly where it had been before. about this time ken showed up with his x-15 land camera, dropped his bike and began to snap off a series of about 3 shots with a flash cube. on about the 3rd flash the craft went from zero to gone in a matter of 2 seconds back in the same northerly direction it came from. the weirdest thing about this event is that we never discussed it among each other, we didn't go back to the house and stay up talking about it, i don't even remember going back to the house that night. i had never talked about our sighting with any of these boys until about 2 years ago. i looked ken up in the phone book and found him living in a nearby town. i called the number and his wife answered telling me that ken was at work. i explained that i had played peewee football with ken and asked if she could have him call me back sometime. ken called me about 20 minutes later. not wanting to lead him on, i allowed him to tell me what he remembered about that night and it was uncanny how much his memory matched my own after 32 years or more. i asked ken if he had ever developed the photos he had taken and he said they had all came back solid black. nothing on the entire roll had developed. to this day ken is the only person there that i have contacted about this event. i guess i'm saving robbie, todd, steve, dale, davie, tim, dahl, leah, cheryl and nan and possibly others for some other day.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft hovered landed rose again hovered and departed at extreme speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were sky watching from our bedroom window (we live on a high elevation and have a wonderful view of the horizon looking south towards ashby ma).I was laying on the bed looking out the window watching the sky (between 10:00pm-11:30pm), when all of the sudden a green light or aura, with a inner red aura lit up the clouds not to far above the tree line(the reason i say "aura" is because the light seemed to completely surround the craft). inside this green-red aura was a cylinder shape craft standing up vertically, but immediately changed it's orientation from vertical to horizontal and at this point i saw that there was some sort of exhaust coming out of the back of it. the color of the craft appeared to be a copper color, but i'm not sure, it could be that the red aura was shining on the craft, making it appear that color. as soon as i saw this i yelled and my girlfriend who was in the same room right next to me looked out, but she only managed to see the green aura because it happened so fast (3-4 seconds). it appeared that craft turned on these lights so it could perform it's transition from vertical to horizontal positioning, but that's just a theory.I grew up near an airport and we sky watch regularly from this exact spot and find it very easy to identify planes and stars and planets.This was neither.
i will forward sketches as soon as i have access to a scanner.
content.summary: While sky watching out of  our bedroom window, i witnessed a cylinder shaped craft which had  a green, red aura surrounding it.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8 pm i was out running and bright lights caught my attention. for the next 2 hours i watched up to 27 bright red and orange slow moving lights follow the same flight path from north to south.  i could not hear any sound from the objects. this makes me think that it was not a normal aircraft. the lights were intense so i could not make out any clear shape of the actual object. 
 i eventually saw up to 5 objects together moving along the same path.  this whole process went on for approx. 2 hours then it stopped.  my neighbors witnessed the same event.  they tried to take some digital pictures.  a few young people stopped and observed the same lights and promptly called 911 to report the ufo.  i was very excited to see a ufo finally and to see several was great! i called a few relatives to let them know about the sightings.  the next day i tried to call the local television news and they were only interested if i had pictures or video.
content.summary: Saw series of bright red-orange lights flying in north to south direction along atlantic coast.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a light appearing in the sky, first like a star but becoming over-sudden very bright, for about two seconds stationary and then it headed north with an incredible speed and disappeared.
i am a german sea captain and spent plenty of years around the world at sea.
i have never seen something like that before.
content.summary: A light appeared in the sky becoming very bright and headed north with incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv,i saw strange looking lights in the sky,just above or at top of tree line.We live on a ridge(probably highest land in county)and have two eight foot sliding glass doors with trapazoid windows above.Needless to say i have an awsome veiw out of the front of our home.We look out over swamp and the tahquamenon river basin,there are no homes or anything out there.What i saw were lights flickering and moving from sw to ne verry slowly,somthing just did not seem right about the lights and when i got up to get a better look they/it just disappeared.There where no clouds in the sky at this time,lots of stars,couse at first thats what i thought,it just went behind a cloud,but there wernt any.
content.summary: Moving flickering lights just above treeline than just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I live in eastbernstadt ky. and on three seperate nights i have seen a large orb in the sky. the first sighting was on jan.12,2009 at around 9pm. my father asked me to come and look at something in the sky, i thought maybe it was going to be a plane or helicopter but when i saw the object i could see that something was not right, i had never seen anything like it and i am 26 years old. my father is 78 years old and said he has never seen anything like it before. the object was bright orange and seemed to be stationary in the sky off to the northwest, there was no sound from the orb. i got my digital camera which has 10x zoom on it and began filming the orb. the orb changed colors from orange to red to green to white and back to orange several times, and even appered to rapidly change shape on a number of occasions. the second sighting i had was on jan. 15, 2009 at around 8:30pm. i was sitting at my computer and my father came in and said in a joking manner "your alien is back", i asked if he was serious and he replied yes only it is closer this time. i went and looked out the living room window and sure enough there was the exact same object only closer to my home and seemed to be directly above the local power substation on hwy.490. as i had previously done i got my digital camera and went onto the front porch and began filming the orb and captured the same results as the first night, color and shape change. the object remained stationary for approximatly 2 hours before moving off to the north west. my third sighting is my most vivid and well noted. i was at my friends home in london on the evening of jan.16, 2009 at around 9pm. i noticed the object back in the northwest once again. my friend filmed the object and we watched as it once again changed color and shape. the orb was a good distance from us i would estimate around a mile from our position. we watched for several hours as this object slowly made it's way across the night sky before dissapering behind the horizon. i will admit that i am a huge ufo skeptic however i have seen something that i can not explain nor can anyone else who has seen it. i have several credible witnesses including my friend who is a sgt. in the u.S army., his wife, her sister, her cousin, my friends uncle and aunt as well as my father and mother. i am not writing this as a hoax or prank or wanting any kind of fame i simply would like to know what i am seeing and should i be concerned.
content.summary: Large unknown orange orb over east bernstadt, ky. saw object three separate nights.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a cigarette, and was looking at the stars, i noticed one really bright star (just checked and it is west of orion at 7:12pm). when i was looking i saw what i thought to be an airplane, i watched it for a minute and didn't see the normal flicker of lights that an airplane would have. i kept watching it and called my wife out to see it as it kept moving east. she came outside and i told her that it could be the iss or a satellite. it was moving in a straight line, she and i were looking at it as we noticed it became significantly dimmer, and then slowly faded out of sight within 3-4 seconds.
content.summary: Looked like a bright star, noticed it was moving eastward at really high altitude

content.detailedDescription: I see a steady round white light that is significantly brighter and larger than surrounding stars.  could this be a planet?
content.summary: Bright steady light  western sky (la mesa ca).

content.detailedDescription: it was 3:00am in th morning. i was looking up onto the night and noticed a strange star in the distance that seemed to (blinking) at me? it seemed as if i could touch it-a pulling effect or my curiosity...It started to freak me out???Instead of panicing i reached for my cameera..As to say, im not going anywhere!!Stay and get the shot photography first freak out later...After i came inside. i went to my computer to download my (pic's)photography talk..Followed by darkroom..There were another person who noticed the blinking lights..He was toasted(drunk), and  he was raving on about the lights he saw..Just earlier this night...I have seen a photo also of a light with clouds around it with a ""state sized object""flowed out of it-the ball of cloudy light...With lines or the side corner of the ship.It had 2 or 3 light lines with variances in light.Like something "huge"/"enormous"/"collossal" ......Then the light went out..And the ufo vanished..{pid}
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: It looked like 4 orbs in  formation of three across, and one centered under #2 orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was selling movies walking toward a neighborhood barber shop on st.Johns place between buffalo&rochester in brooklyn,n.Y.On my way to serve some customers. so i was lighting a cigarette and it just caught my eye. a gigantic football,walnut type craft it was just streaking across the sky i mean it was really moving. i stopped what i was doing. due to the fact that i study u.F.O.'s in depth to an extent so i payed close attention to what was before me!!??! long story short i closely scrutinized the shape as best i could the moon wasn't predominant this night. i managed to make out the approximate shape of the object and i managed to be sure that it wasn't the average run-of-the-mill aeronautic objects that occupy our airspace everyday.I mean this thing was really moving i mean really,really moving.The few seconds that it would take to clear the space it cleared for a regular plane or secret experiment to clear it did it in a 1/3 of the time maybe less,maybe an eighth of the time.Either way this isn't the first time i've seen something that shouldn't usually be in the sky off&on since i was seventeen. i wouldn't have paid it half a mind if it wasn't going so [cms/pd/tg] fast it cleared a patch of sky the size of a large parking lot in no-time at all i mean fast!I didn't really loose sight of the object i had to get going to where i had to be and it was just going to where it (or they) were on their way to where they were going it was just moving so fast it didn't make any sense to be going so fast so low. it wasn't a plane of any raptor or other fighter. the military flies over brooklyn sometime on their way to where ever it is they're going so i know what fighters look and sound like!!! bingo that's the main thing that let me know that it wasn't something that belongs in the skies everyday or that is in the skies everyday. it made no sound at all!!!!!??! not one peep no vapor trail no heat line no wings nothing but two red lights and incredible speed and mainly no sound i didn't hear it before i saw it or while it was going by or after it went by due to the way sound travels when a high speed object is moving. simply two red lights,funny shape ,no wings ,no sound at all ,no sound at all that almost scared me a little the size of it and the fact it made no sound!!
content.summary: On the way home from work i saw two red lights simultaneously, parallel. flying faster than fighters. could just barely make the shape out cross between football tear drop huge3 footballfieldseasynotreallythat highup3-5,000ft.Tops.Juststreakigacrossthesky

content.detailedDescription: I had just left work after 11:30pm. on thurs. 1/15 when driving east down rte. 62 in danvers i noticed a bright object in the southern sky. i first said to myself it had to be a plane as logan intl. is only about 8 miles from where the object was, but i did see a plane near the object. as i started heading east on rte. 128n the object started moving ahead of me moving in a n/ne. i lost sight of it on my left side, then a minute or two later it was to my right. i then decided to follow it all the way to the end of the highway into gloucester and went straight to the ocean and stopped my truck. i obseverved the object now stopped and hovering near thatcher island which is right off the coast of rockport. it was just hovering there moving slightly erraticly and seemed like it was moving closer to me. i then drove down the coastline to see if i could get a closer look. i was now even closer to the island and it just hovered and moved around in kind of a circular motion. glowing brighter and shimmering. it was about 5 degrees out and barely any cloud cover. i watched it for about a half hr. between both places. i couldn't stay and watch all night because i had to get up early that morning. i then left and i wanted to see if i could see it again before i went home. i went to good harbor beach which is about a half mile from the island, and it was hovering high over the beach. i would say about 2000-5000ft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Followed bright star-like object, moving, hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I spent the evening with a local astronomer in town named {pid}
i had just purchased a nice pair of binoculars for sky observation. he was to help me get back into amateur astronomy.We spent the evening looking at the planet jupiter, and looking at pictures he had taken of deep space objects.So, i was excited to do my own observing.
i got home about 12:30 a.M. i went to bed. i got up at about 3:30 a.M..
i noticed out the window the constellation orion was in the southeastern
horizon. i grabbed my binoculars to observe the potential objects in orions belt. i sat on a bench in my backyard to do the observation.
as i was observing orion a bright red light came into my field of vision.
i let the binoculars down. i observed 6 large red lights moving east toward our backyard tree line. my first impression was that it was a formation of 3 jets, and i was observing their afterburners.As i sat there in awe, i thought there is no sound.I lifted my binoculars and got maybe a 3 sec. look at the red lights. they seemed to have a spiral type configuration to them? then it was gone over the tree tops. i just sat there saying to myself "what the {pd} was that"!!!! i didn't even get up to find another observation perspective-which seems strange to me.I could not get to sleep that night. in the morning i called both our local airport and sheriffs office-nobody saw a thing. i know i saw something, but at times question myself. weird
content.summary: Ver y black, six large red lights, possibly triangular.

content.detailedDescription: There are ufos over slc.From my vantage point they are easiest seen overhead and the northeast quadrant of the sky generally in the direction of the northstar.At night they appear as pinpoint pricks of light like a small satelite passing by-same thing during daylight.                               there is always many up there performing with amazing speeds and acrobatics. they make the occasional f-16s flying by to and from hill field airbase look slow and cumbersome in comparison.                               i have never seen one go in a straight line. they usually make wide sweeping arcs and looping or angled turns.                                 go check them out!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Many ufos in sky, persistantly.

content.detailedDescription:
The secret of olyphant, the greatest, the most incredible, the most shocking, and the most censored theory/story in world history. 
i was on my roof in olyphant pa. about 9pm on or around july 20, 1997 and i saw a light in the sky about 40.000 feet above the churches in olyphant. the ufo was travelling west, in a straight line at a speed faster than an airplane but slower than a shooting star. the object passed over olyphant and exploded into a flash of light and it disappeared. i learned later that is exactly what occurs when a ufo goes thru a portal or door. at the time i was probably just looking at the stars and cooling off and at first i thought it was just a light but i became perplexed when it exploded. 

    i have done extensive research on the town of olyphant the most mysterious town in world history. here is a small summary. olyphant means the secret of the gods and many of the answers to the great questions such as the secret of the pyramids and the ufos can be found in olyphant. everything in the universe is made from pyramids of light and you do not die but live forever. the town of olyphant has a hidden worid that no one knew about. the town is designed after ancient egypt but no one knew it. for instance there is a sphinx in olyphant 5mi long and no one knew it. our researchers have discovered a door or portal in olyphant that is being used by ufos. our researchers just last week have discovered a giant egyptian crop circle in olyphant of an egyptian scarab beetle that confirms our theory that we are immortal. i have to go. my story and theory has appeared in several newspapers and headlines locally. for more information go to www.Google.Com and punch in the secret of olyphant, then go to mysteries of olyphant. learn how god created us and why we do not die but live forever, also gt broadcast, see olyphants great pyramid and the giant sphinx and the churches orion star connection also www.Thorthebarbarian.Com other worlds adventures  olyphant and another world, olyphant and orion, secret knowledge from another world. who created olyphant? my e-mail is {pid} thank you.
content.summary: Ufo travelling west over olyphant, pa exploded into light as it went thru the door in olyphant.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting around the fire at my friends house on conant st. (satilights cruz by in a strate line).These looked like they where chasing each other.They went by and before i could look down i saw this triangle come over the house.I yeld to my friends look what the hell is that?It looked like there were sparks shooting in twords the center of it.The sparks stoped and you could see the black underside the tipps remande litt it rotated slowly as it flew by slowly.If i held a coin out in front of me to the length of my arm it would be bigger than a half dollar.It was pretty close five other people saw it with me know one seemed to be to excited about it (i was).As it moved down conant st.It seemed to change shape an undistiguishing shape.I took three pic's only one shows anything but i didn't have my reading glasses with me so i couldn't adjust my cellphone camera properly the pic is very pixellated.I spoke to stanton freidmann about it and emailed the pic to him.  p.S. mr friedmann is great guy.Very easy to talk too.That's the second ufo iv'e seen the first was in 05 a silver/gray orb in same town but no camera at the time.Two other witnesses.
content.summary: Saw two satelites chasing each other while looking at that the triangle flew over the house real low.

content.detailedDescription: In my home, during at 9:00 pm... something disturb me, the very bright light star-like object move too fast about 5 sec and disappear!
content.summary: Very bright  light star-like object.

content.detailedDescription: As a dealer in a early morning sun. swap meet, was heading to the john, flickering light in darkness, made me look up+ at first thought it to be a fireworks item- fired from a fishing boat in the havasu lake. - then realized it was a meteorite fire ball, heading over the city to the se.+ it was totally silent+ after it quickly stopped burning + kept heading down + away towards the desert, i realized it was a burning large craft, with balls of rolling white hot metal things coming of of it in front + rolling back into the red-yellow fire in the middle of it. it was possibly 2000 feet up? + moving at jet plane speed? + appeared the size of a big airliner?. as i watched it just burned out + dissapearsd into the darkness in a dim red glow, + was gone. other swap meeters saw it too+ descibed exactly what i [thought] i saw! i lestened for a swish or some sound to catch up, no sound at all! it appeared to be going to crash in the desert about 5 miles from town. never a report to me as to what it was/??- in view about 10-15 sec. possibly space junk, or a craft on fire+ headed to surly hit the desert to the se. too slow for a meteorite.????
content.summary: Large burning vehicle-slowly headed se+quietly falling to the desert  beyond.

content.detailedDescription:
As my parents flew over from france to their condo in florida with sisters for a vacation between beginning and mid february 1988 , i flew down from paris where i was studying to look after their nice villa as many burglaries were taking place at that time in the region.

the house is a 3000 sq ft villa with five bedrooms and bathrooms , nestled hillside on some rolling hills with a great view on the med from a distance.Closest neighbours are about 150 meters away on either side as primarily these part of the city consists of large estates.One private road brings to our house (this is some years back , 21 years ago).With a huge sheperd dog that would bark at any noise we were well aware of any person walking in the vicinity on the steet some fifity meters lower.

a friend came over i hadn t seeen for a while as had moved up to paris for studies six months before.It was about 6 pm on february 15 or 16 th 1988.We chat a while , had a few sodas and finally started cooking a meal which we ate , went to the local video store to view some movies that night.I recall those films being comedies as we liked to have a good laugh.

the house was a one story villa built hillside so living quraters were on first floor , except for an independent efficiency room and bathroom on bottom level.Rest of ground level is a three car garage and storage place with an communicating little storage room with the boiler and heating system in there (house had a fuel central heating system).Garden was a steep hill with many olive trees and umbrella pine trees very common on the med coast of france.House was surrounded by terrasses , a walkway around the back of the house and a swimming pool at te opposite end.

after we view the films , we decide to go to bed , my room was next to the friends room.Our dog was outside as usual.This was about midnight.

i fall asleep and am waken up by bonnie , the pyrenean sheperd just howling and barking as never before.A big dog of about 100 pounds very gentle but known not to mess around with from strangers.

as i wake up going to the window to see what was going on , as i open the steel shutters , i hear my friend yell and scream with terror.He was woken himself by the barking and as he opened his eyes , saw two red eyes glowing in the dark from outside.The shutters were closed , however even made of steel they had regular local style shapes with spaces between them like a french window , and one of them was broken at a height of approximaely two meters.

the dog stops howling and makes actually no more noise.Growls evey now and then.From the garage downstairs we both hear a door banging as if someone had been opening it with force then just slamming it a few times in a row.

i take a 22 lr handy in this case of spooky happenings , thinking a burglar team is on the loose around the house and targeting my parents villa , open the bullet proof door (5mm steel covered it entirely and frame was reinforced and built in within the wall with huge steel rods every foot), a very secure home.I just got afraid for bonnie thinking these guys could have hurt her , so we decide to go outside , then all lights on (possible from inside at the entry with switches for all the exterior lights).

feeling secure with the weapon , we don t find any trace of anything and even less the dog.She must have run away.But that dog could defeat some very large dogs and had seen it in the past so we wondered what kind of thing could scare the dog.After verifying nothing was around the house on a check tour , we decide to go and see what was causing such tremendous noise in the locked basement/garage.

the door to the boiler room was definitely closed.Nothing to be seen.

we go back upu , tuen every light on in the house , and come to speak of the recent events.The corsican buddy was a tall six foot two courageous person , and i was all muscle and six feet , both of us practised karate at a higher level , and though hate to admit it , we had been in a couple of bar fights as young men full of testosterone do when they are teenagers.This corsican guy was strong and never backed away on those occasion.

here , he seemed terrified as what he d seen was absolutely beyond his comprehension.Two red glowing eyes at two meters high and he stated he d recall this thing seemed to see him in the totally dark room and see "through him" as in inside his mind.

the dog finally comes back.Two hours had passed it was about 2 or 2:30 am in the night.We thought of calling the police but they d certainly just do the same we did and make a statement and file it as usual with no real efficiency against the robbers that had ben storming the city for a few weeks.

as we are talking , we hear like a converstaion between two invisible people in the living room we were in , but as if through a closed door , noise seemed attenuated.

soon after the door started banging again in the garage and as we went down , nothing , plainly nothing , door is shut , not a noise , noone to be seen.The dog did growl in the garage as we went down there again.

she had her tail between her legs since her return from wherever she had been hiding.

three last events happened that night:

1 door banged again every now and then with an impression of the entire villa shaking or vibrating to a point i thought there was an earhquake.
i verified the following morning and nothing of the sort took place around the french rivierathat night .

2 before going back to bed i was in the bathroom and had a sip of water before going to sleep (if i could !!!) and had a clear vision of my step dad and sisiter at the airport in paris, some kind of clairvoyance .The following morning they called around 10 am to let me know they had both decided to come home earlier than planned for whatever reason and without letting me know or calling me from florida to let me know so could pic them up.This came as a surpsride and has never happened again.

3 as i lay in bed , i feel like someone blowing on my face which scared the hell out of me.I idn t sleep at all if i remember correctly.Moreover the corsican buddy had felt the same blow on his face before going to sleep.

he never came back to sleep at that place ever again.And i did pick sister and step dad up at airport the following afternoon but never had an explanation on any kind on what this strange night was about or what could have caused it.

i do recall another detail is that electrical power did blow and had to go to entry of property to reset the central electrical switch where electricity of france , the supplier had by law installed their disrupters.
content.summary: Ce3 encounter humanoid luminous red eyes poltergeist activity.

content.detailedDescription:
I d like to bring to you a fact i have kept to anyone but my wife and that is highly troubling me.
 
last week on the night from wednesay to thursday at around 3 am i had been working a helluva lot on my computer for all this alexandria project and sending out emails to french ufo organizations and decided to go and have a smoke outside as i am a smoker for a break to get my head off this stuff for a little while and as i had a stiff neck from all the time sitting bent over my laptop on my desk.
 
there is a place i like to go at night watch the sky in my garden while looking at a specific pine tree quite high in my neighbours garden and having at the same time a view on the stars , its very relaxing to me , and frankly the sky here is crystal clear when the mistral wind blows as it had the previous day , taking any cloud away.Chilly but relaxing and close to nature.
 
this area i like to stand watch is a footstep away from my back patio.While having my cigarette , i tell to myself turning arounf to the patio which is open to the outside and covered with a roof under which stands what french call "a summer kitchen " some sort of exterior kitchen (some kind of barbecue area for americans except there really is a gas stove , sink and all necessary stuff for cooking outside meals , and is bonded with a whole bunch of bric a brac stuff.So tell myself 'time to clean up this mess i will do it tomorrow".Must have taken about thirty seconds.
 
i feel something tingling and turn around and watch the skyright at that spot above the pine tree , a triangular ufo with four red lights under it forming a square , not blinking , just constantly lit appears or seems to appear as i hadn t heard it approach , nor seen it for that matter.It was hovering above the neighbours garden past the tree but seemed right above the pine tree from my standing position.
 
suddenly i feel panicked and observed , or simply noticed and run from patio to the front door which was distant about 15 yards away alongside the house , just a corner of the house to reach.As i arrive at the corner of the house , i hold on to a gutter which drains water from the roof to the sewaer directly and feel like paralyzed and my eye sight became blurry while i recall one thing before remembering waking up in my bed the following morning: i thought "missing time" in english.
 
i usually think in french as i have been speaking french seemingly forever.The fact of thinking that term in english was awkward.
 
as i woke up the following morning , i told my wife i had a dream that seemed just so realistic that i felt the cold , dreamed as never before as it seemed so realistic and colourful: i could feel absolutely everything had that been a dream.Suddenly i realized that the state i was in was similar to that of an operation i had at hospital last september when i was operated on my left arm and only shoulder was put asleep but as i was anxious , the surgeon had the nurse give me a product that just put me in an altered relaxed state of consciousness during lapses of sleep.I recall for instance being in a room at hospital , waking up with a bunch of people in beds as myself , speaking to a male nurse , him answering me and falling back to sleep , knowing this had ben real as i had spoken to that same nurse on my waking up after the operation had been done successfully.That operation had been the kind when you come in at morning and leave at night , french calling it ambulatory hospitalization for a day in short.
 
that episode at hospital seemed like a dream but was however a chemically induced antianxiety process which somehow disconnected me from reality.When i woke up , i was glad all had been well as i hate being operated on or simply in a hospital.
 
the following morning when i spoke to my wife , i recalled the episode but wondered how i d landed back in my bed and was just plainly puzzling me , and has since.
 
when i d seen the uso from the yacht in the bahamas in 1989 i was very excited and flabbergasted about this experience which was quite something extraordinary.At the contrary , this one is absolutely mind boggling and i do not know how to react to it.
 
could you please give me some advice on this one.
 
i have told to myself that working so long on ufo contacts , investigations and such on the past weeks for long hours everyday has made my brain "see what i was reading" or something like that , but i am still very anxious and no longer go close to that patio to have my smoke and feel uneasy when looking at that scenery now.
 
the craft in itself was plain rectangular and was wbout 160/ 170 degrees above me to the horizon and seemed not to move while i ran for the door.
i was able to see it clearly as street lights nearby are lit all night long , and could see it s shape with the disappearance of stars in back of it.
 
finally , just thinking about this experience just makes me plainly sick and induces nearly panick attacks.I have never experienced anything like this and would like to have your feelings about this please.
 
it comes at a moment where i am contacting quite a few people in the ufology field and have joined a large organization in same and trying to get comprehension of this phenomenon more global so as to advance faster in understanding it.
 
afew years back , in a street adjacent to the one i live close to the med , a few inhabitants have seen a ufo hover arounf this area but descrition was different.And only flew above to disappear where here i have no clue to what happened afterwards as i was plainly pralyzed and tried to resist this power with great will before thinking missing time and waking up in my bed.
 
this to me is just absolutely shocking as i feel violated in my own home , that is the best i could express what i do feel.
content.summary: Triangle shaped dark 4 red lights under paralyzed missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
at approximately  2255 hours i stepped onto my back porch to have a cigarette.  as i always do on clear nights, i began looking at the stars.  i was facing east, and something caught my eye to my left.  i immediately thought it would be a "falling star" but then saw what appeared to be five small, orange lights traveling at the same speed and in a formation.  
  the object was silent and moving at a high rate of speed and appeared to be lower in altitude than normal air traffic. in addition, the object was traveling in a different direction than usual air traffic.  the object came from a nnw traveling ssw, whereas normal air traffic usually goes in a easterly or westerly direction.
  the object appeared to be solid, yet it seemed to be transparent at the same time.  the orange colored lights were continuous and did not strobe.  the object appeared to be in a "delta type formation" but, one of the lights however, seemed to be out of place on the object, unless the object would have been banking or was at an odd angle.
   i continued watching the object as the tree in my front yard blocked the view over the roof, but when the object emerged in the clear of the tree again, i noticed it began to fade in brightness and then disappeared completely.
   the object made no sound whatsoever, which i found odd from the beginning. the temperature outside was -6 degrees, and the skies were clear.  i know from my time in the military, that sound travels easier in cold air and the craft left no contrails despite the temperature.
content.summary: Delta or boomerang shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was sitting by my computer looking at ufo sightings at approximate 10:45 and i looked out the window and was just looking. first i noticed the tv on in someone's house. then a plane was flying by. then i saw a "white dot". i told myself i am just hallucinating but then the "white dot" just jolted downward and i lost sight of the object. i felt strange as if someone was staring at me at the time of the sighting. i did not capture it with my camera due to the fact that it did not want to turn on.
content.summary: I just saw a ball and then it went fast down.

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly after sunset i walked outside, looked up and saw what appeared to be a very bright red orange twinkling star. it seemed out of place. i called a friend outside to help verify what i was seeing. we agreed it was out of the ordinary and wathced as long as the very frigid evening would allow. the sky was clear,exceptionally cold, and near zero temperature.
he returned indoors and i continued to my truck, got what i needed and headed back indoors. as i walked away from my vehicle i glanced over my shoulder to get one last look at the object and it was gone.
i called my friend back outside to show him that the object had disappeared. neither one of us had a rational explaination. 
just wondering if anyone else saw something similar about that time?
content.summary: Bright flashing red orange star like anomaly low north west horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on 35w between elko and northfield exit.I just happened to look to the east when i saw a light that seemed to follow me that whole way getting brighter and lighter while following me down the freeway going the same speed as me about 70mph . at one point i looked at it and it seemed to shoot a good distance to the south in what was maybe a 1/2 second. i have not seen anything like this in my lifetime. i have always been intrigued by the thought of seeing something like this but when it happened i was filled with more fright than anything else. when i stopped at exit 69 the object stopped as well. when i turned to the east on hwy 19 the object moved out of the horizon to the north which is towards the metro and the airport. it just seemed very strange that this thing was moving parallel to me for so long then just left out of view. the strangest part of the whole experience is when the object seemed to have a burst of power or something cause the light seemed to get a lot brighter for about 5-10sec then fade to its normal brightness.
content.summary: Very bright light that seemed to follow.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a wed. night and i was watching jeopardy when i noticed out of the corner of my eye, out my front picture window, a large "plane" flying really low and i thought it was going to crash into the large apartment building down the street from my home. i live on the hill at the top of the street and the building sits a few blocks away directly in front of my house. i called my son to see if he could see it...He lives down the block... but it was too low and he couldn't see it. 
as i watched it i realized how slow it was moving and i didn't know what "it" was. i wasn't afraid because i was trying to wrap my brain around what i was watching...I just kept trying to refocus my eyes and convince myself it was just a plane. my son yelled for me to get my camera... i was just staring at it. i ran and got my camera, came back out and started taking pictures but because it was night time, the exposure was too long. it was moving very slowly and didn't make a sound. it had three white lights in the front. i live in allentown city so there are landmarks like the ppl building in the picture that you can use to gauge how low it was and how large it was...Although the object is shaky (from the long exposure). i watched it move slowly past me...It took a few minutes to approach my house and pass it. i realized it was moving too slow to be a plane and a helicopter would make some noise...This made none.
i told my son to run out back to see if he could see it as it was passing... i ran out back and realized he wouldn't be able to because now it was actually moving along behind the trees that run along that stretch of road. i told him to get in his car and come pick me up so i could show him, as i watched it float out of my view. we went looking for it and tried to figure out where it went, but it had just disappeared.
content.summary: Low flying object over allentown, pa.
